name: fat_mat2d_plot.py
author: AFNI Team
description: Plots simple matrices output from 3dNetCorr (*.netcc) and 3dTrackID (*.grid).

inputs.description: Name of *.netcc or *.grid file with matrices to be plotted
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: List of matrices to be plotted, identified by their parameter name. If no list is provided, then all matrices in the input file will be plotted.
inputs.name: Matrices to Plot

inputs.description: Output basename for image(s). Note that this can include path information, but the name of each matrix and the file extension will be appended to it.
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Filetype, given as extension (e.g., png, jpg). Available filetypes depend slightly on your OS and setup.
inputs.name: Output File Type

inputs.description: Spatial resolution (dots per inch) of output images.
inputs.name: DPI

inputs.description: Minimum value of the colorbar.
inputs.name: Colorbar Minimum

inputs.description: Maximum value of the colorbar.
inputs.name: Colorbar Maximum

inputs.description: Font size of ticks along the x-axis.
inputs.name: X-ticks Font Size

inputs.description: Font size of ticks along the y-axis.
inputs.name: Y-ticks Font Size

inputs.description: Font size of the title.
inputs.name: Title Font Size

inputs.description: Font size of the colorbar.
inputs.name: Colorbar Font Size

inputs.description: Number of intervals on colorbars for enumeration purposes. This controls how many numbers appear along the colorbar (which would be NI +1).
inputs.name: Colorbar Intervals

inputs.description: Name of the colorbar to use. The available colormaps can be found online.
inputs.name: Colorbar

inputs.description: Width of the colorbar as a percentage of the image.
inputs.name: Colorbar Width Percentage

inputs.description: Disable the colorbar in the image.
inputs.name: Disable Colorbar

inputs.description: Width of the created image in inches.
inputs.name: Figure Width

inputs.description: Height of the created image in inches.
inputs.name: Figure Height

inputs.description: In addition to saving an image file, open the image and keep displaying it until a key is pressed in the terminal.
inputs.name: Hold Image

inputs.description: Use matplotlib's tight layout functionality in arranging the plot.
inputs.name: Tight Layout

inputs.description: Don't display labels along the x-axis.
inputs.name: Disable X Ticks

inputs.description: Don't display labels along the y-axis.
inputs.name: Disable Y Ticks

inputs.description: Display the version number of the program.
inputs.name: Version

inputs.description: Display the release/editing date of the current version.
inputs.name: Date

inputs.description: Display help in the terminal.
inputs.name: Help

inputs.description: Display help in a separate text editor.
inputs.name: Help View

output-files.description: Individual image files of matrices; these can contain colorbars, as well.
output-files.name: Output Image Files
